![JPerez](https://burlingtonwa.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=6008 "JPerez")

Dr. Jesús Pérez-Linares
=======================

[City Council](https://burlingtonwa.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=10)  
Title: Councilmember  
Phone: [360-755-0531](tel:3607550531)

  
  

Current Term: January 1, 2022 - December 31, 2025

This is Dr. Pérez-Linares' first term as Councilmember for Ward 6.

He is a marine biologist with a PhD in management and conservation of natural resources. He worked for 18+ years in Research and Development collaborating in different countries: Mexico, Spain, New Zealand, Ireland, Portugal and the USA. He graduated from WWU in 2015 obtaining a teaching certification. Currently he is a 5th grade teacher at West View Elementary. He believes that hard work, perseverance, kindness and integrity are the key to succeed.

Jesús serves on the Public Works Committee, Public Safety Committee, Parks & Recreation Board, and the Audit & Finance Committee, and as an alternate member on the Arts Commission. Jesús hopes to bring a diverse perspective to the City Council to voice the needs and help the growing community in our beautiful city.
